TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Paudadan, title = Paudadan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paudadan} }

S.FORM: Paudadan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Paudadan a niyaro', 254 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 727 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 72% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 526 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 28% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 201 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bunun 4%, Tayal 4%, Truku 12%, Kebalan 1%, roma 3%.

Paodadan Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Paodadan a niyaro', 254 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 727 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 72% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 526 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 28% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 201 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 48%, 撒奇拉雅族1%, Bonon 4%, Tayal 4%, Troko 12%, Kebalan 1%, roma 3%.
